snippet: The former secretary of state said that many are struggling to enter, or stay in, the middle class.
abstract: Hillary Clinton, addressing public policy group New America Foundation, calls for policies intended to help struggling middle class, in speech that seems suited to a campaign.
lead_paragraph: The former secretary of state said that many are struggling to enter, or stay in, the middle class.

headline.main: Clinton Calls for Expanding Economic Opportunities
headline.print_headline: Clinton Calls for Expanding Economic Opportunities
